channel.title: The Manual on The Arkr Manual
channel.description: Recent content in The Manual on The Arkr Manual

item.title: AI vs. ML vs. DL
item.description: Definitions, the history, the hierarchy of intelligence.

item.title: Analog vs. Digital
item.description: Continuous vs. discrete signals, sampling, quantization error, why digital wins for storage.

item.title: Big-O Notation
item.description: Time complexity, space complexity, best/worst/average case, O(1) vs O(n) vs O(n^2).

item.title: Machine Code
item.description: Opcodes, operands, raw binary instructions, hex dumps.

item.title: Scaling
item.description: Vertical (hardware upgrade) vs. Horizontal (add more nodes).

item.title: The Blog
item.description: Rich text rendering, canonical URLs, SEO optimization, caching static content, recommendation tagging.

item.title: The Clock
item.description: Oscillators, quartz crystals, frequency (Hz), clock cycles, overclocking.

item.title: The Database
item.description: Flat files vs. DBMS, integrity, structured storage.

item.title: The Distributed Cache
item.description: Eviction policies (LRU/LFU), consistent hashing for partitioning, gossip protocols for cluster state.

item.title: The Feed
item.description: Fan-out-on-write vs. Fan-out-on-load, hybrid approaches for celebrities, timeline merging, redis clusters.

item.title: The Kernel
item.description: Kernel space vs. User space, Protection Rings, the role of the OS.

item.title: The Link Shortener
item.description: Base62 encoding, hash collisions, separate ID generation, read-heavy caching strategies.

item.title: The Network Stack
item.description: The OSI 7-Layer Model, The TCP/IP Model, encapsulation.

item.title: Version Control
item.description: Git internals, Blobs/Trees/Commits, Merging, Branching strategies.

item.title: Arrays
item.description: Contiguous memory, cache locality, O(1) access, fixed size limitations.

item.title: Assembly Language
item.description: Mnemonics, moving data to registers, basic jumps, 1:1 mapping to hardware.

item.title: Link Layer
item.description: MAC Addresses, Ethernet frames, Collision domains, ARP.

item.title: Load Balancing
item.description: L4 (Transport) vs. L7 (Application) balancing, Round Robin, Least Connections.

item.title: Memory Elements
item.description: Feedback loops, SR Latch, D Flip-Flop, storing a bit of state.

item.title: Relational (SQL)
item.description: Tables, Rows, Columns, Schemas, Primary Keys, Foreign Keys.

item.title: SDLC
item.description: Agile, Waterfall, Scrum, JIRA, the lifecycle of a feature.

item.title: Statistics for ML
item.description: Probability, Bayes’ Theorem, Standard Deviation, Distributions.

item.title: The Bit
item.description: Shannon’s information theory, entropy, resolution of uncertainty, the binary choice.

item.title: The Boot Process
item.description: BIOS/UEFI, Bootloaders (GRUB), Kernel initialization, Init systems (systemd).

item.title: The Chat App
item.description: XMPP vs. custom protocols, maintaining millions of WebSocket connections (Erlang/Elixir models), end-to-end encryption (Signal protocol).

item.title: The E-Commerce Store
item.description: Product catalog schemas, inventory locking (pessimistic vs. optimistic), shopping cart persistence, checkout race conditions.

item.title: The Message Broker
item.description: Log-structured storage, partitions, consumer groups, offset management, sequential I/O performance.

item.title: The Pastebin
item.description: Data expiration policies, object storage vs. block storage, generating unique readable keys.

item.title: Feature Engineering
item.description: Cleaning data, normalization, one-hot encoding, vectors.

item.title: High-Level Languages
item.description: Abstraction layers, “The C Language” as the baseline, compiled vs. interpreted vs. JIT.

item.title: Linked Lists
item.description: Pointers, nodes, singly vs. doubly linked, O(1) insertions/deletions.

item.title: Network Layer
item.description: IP Addresses (IPv4 vs IPv6), Packets, Time To Live (TTL).

item.title: Processes
item.description: The Process Control Block (PCB), PID, process states (Ready, Running, Blocked).

item.title: Registers
item.description: Accumulators, Program Counter (PC), Instruction Register (IR), Stack Pointer.

item.title: SQL Language
item.description: SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, WHERE, JOINs (Inner, Left, Right).

item.title: Stateless vs. Stateful
item.description: Handling sessions, sticky sessions vs. external stores (Redis).

item.title: Testing
item.description: Unit tests, Integration tests, End-to-End (E2E) tests, TDD, Mocks/Stubs.

item.title: The Booking System
item.description: Handling concurrency (double-booking prevention), state machines for reservations, eventual consistency in search vs. booking.

item.title: The Load Balancer
item.description: L4 vs L7 routing, health checks, round-robin vs. least-connections, handling TLS termination.

item.title: The Notification System
item.description: Fan-out patterns, message queues (RabbitMQ), push notifications (APNS/FCM), retry logic.

item.title: The Switch
item.description: Voltage levels, ground, conductors vs. insulators, using electricity to represent state.

item.title: The Video Stream
item.description: Adaptive Bitrate Streaming (DASH/HLS), CDN edge placement, encoding ladders, DRM.

item.title: CI/CD
item.description: Continuous Integration pipelines, Continuous Deployment, Artifacts, Linters.

item.title: Message Queues
item.description: Producers, Consumers, Brokers (RabbitMQ), decoupling services.

item.title: Normalization
item.description: 1NF, 2NF, 3NF, reducing redundancy, data integrity.

item.title: Stacks & Queues
item.description: LIFO vs. FIFO, push/pop operations, circular buffers.

item.title: Subnetting
item.description: CIDR notation, Subnet masks, Private vs. Public IPs, NAT.

item.title: Supervised Learning
item.description: Regression (Linear/Logistic), Classification, Labeling data.

item.title: The CPU
item.description: The Von Neumann architecture, Control Unit (CU), ALU, data paths.

item.title: The Forum
item.description: Nested comments (trees in SQL), ranking algorithms (Wilson Score Interval), hot/new sorting, caching heavy read threads.

item.title: The Job Scheduler
item.description: Distributed task queues, delayed execution, handling worker failures, “at least once” delivery.

item.title: The Key-Value Store
item.description: Tunable consistency (W+R > N), vector clocks, hinted handoff, ring topology.

item.title: The Live Stream
item.description: RTMP ingestion, transcoding, low-latency HLS, chat scalability (IRC), handling massive spikes.

item.title: The Toolchain
item.description: IDEs, linters, linkers, build systems, what happens when you press “Run”.

item.title: The Transistor
item.description: Semiconductors, N-type vs. P-type silicon, the MOSFET, how a transistor acts as a switch.

item.title: Threads
item.description: Light-weight processes, shared memory, User threads vs. Kernel threads.

item.title: ACID Properties
item.description: Atomicity, Consistency, Isolation, Durability.

item.title: Boolean Logic
item.description: True/False, Boolean algebra, logical operators, truth tables.

item.title: Hash Tables
item.description: Hashing functions, buckets, key-value mapping, O(1) average lookup.

item.title: Infrastructure as Code
item.description: Terraform, Ansible, declarative infrastructure, “Pet vs Cattle”.

item.title: Pub/Sub Systems
item.description: Kafka, Topics, Partitions, Consumer Groups, event streaming.

item.title: Routing
item.description: Routers, Hops, BGP (Border Gateway Protocol), Routing tables.

item.title: Scheduling
item.description: Context switching, Preemptive multitasking, Round Robin, FIFO, Priority queues.

item.title: The Blob Store
item.description: File chunking, erasure coding (Reed-Solomon), metadata separation, multipart uploads.

item.title: The Instruction Cycle
item.description: Fetch, Decode, Execute, Store, the role of the clock.

item.title: The Rate Limiter
item.description: Token Bucket vs. Leaky Bucket algorithms, distributed throttling with Redis/Lua, API quotas.

item.title: The Ride Hailing App
item.description: Real-time location tracking, hexagonal spatial indexing (H3), driver-rider matching algorithms, dynamic pricing engines.

item.title: The Social Graph
item.description: Graph databases (Neo4j), bidirectional relationships, finding “friends of friends,” privacy controls.

item.title: Unsupervised Learning
item.description: Clustering (K-Means), Dimensionality reduction.

item.title: Variables & Scope
item.description: Stack vs. Heap memory, block scope, global scope, variable lifetime, stack overflow.

item.title: Authentication (AuthN)
item.description: “Who are you?”, Passwords, MFA, SSO.

item.title: CDNs
item.description: Edge locations, caching static assets, reducing latency.

item.title: Concurrency
item.description: Race conditions, Critical sections, atomicity.

item.title: Data Types
item.description: Primitives (int, bool, float) vs. Reference types (objects, pointers), null/nil safety.

item.title: Hash Collisions
item.description: Chaining (linked lists), Open Addressing (probing), load factors.

item.title: Indexing
item.description: B-Trees, how indexes speed up reads but slow down writes.

item.title: Logic Gates
item.description: AND, OR, NOT, XOR, NAND, NOR, building gates from transistors.

item.title: Neural Networks
item.description: Perceptrons, Weights, Biases, Activation Functions (ReLU, Sigmoid).

item.title: RAM
item.description: Static RAM (SRAM) vs. Dynamic RAM (DRAM), capacitors, refresh cycles, volatility.

item.title: The API Gateway
item.description: Rate limiting, authentication offloading, circuit breaking, request aggregation, protocol translation.

item.title: The Collaborator
item.description: Operational Transformation (OT) vs. CRDTs, conflict resolution, WebSocket presence, saving snapshots.

item.title: The Payment Gateway
item.description: Idempotency keys, double-entry bookkeeping, distributed transactions (2PC/Sagas), PCI compliance.

item.title: The Web Crawler
item.description: URL frontiers, politeness policies, robots.txt parsing, dealing with cyclic graphs, DNS resolution at scale.

item.title: Transport Layer: UDP
item.description: Datagrams, fire-and-forget, use cases (gaming, streaming).

item.title: Authorization (AuthZ)
item.description: “What can you do?”, RBAC (Role Based), ABAC (Attribute Based).

item.title: Combinational Circuits
item.description: Half-adders, full-adders, multiplexers, decoders, the Arithmetic Logic Unit (ALU).

item.title: Distributed Consensus
item.description: The Generals Problem, Paxos, Raft, Quorums.

item.title: Learning
item.description: Loss functions, Gradient Descent, Backpropagation, Epochs.

item.title: Static vs. Dynamic Typing
item.description: Type systems, compile-time vs. runtime errors, type inference, “strongly” typed.

item.title: Synchronization
item.description: Mutexes, Semaphores, Locks, Monitors.

item.title: The Analytics Engine
item.description: Columnar storage benefits, data ingestion pipelines, OLAP vs. OLTP, pre-aggregation.

item.title: The Cloud Drive
item.description: File synchronization logic, differential sync (rsync algorithms), block-level deduplication, version history.

item.title: The ID Generator
item.description: Twitter’s Snowflake algorithm, sequence numbers, clock synchronization, collision avoidance in distributed systems.

item.title: The Map
item.description: Tiles and rendering, Quadtrees for geospatial indexing, A* routing at scale, geocoding.

item.title: The Memory Hierarchy
item.description: Registers vs. L1/L2/L3 Cache vs. RAM vs. Disk, latency numbers everyone should know.

item.title: Transactions
item.description: Commit, Rollback, Savepoints, Concurrency control.

item.title: Transport Layer: TCP
item.description: Segments, The 3-Way Handshake, reliability, flow control, windowing.

item.title: Trees
item.description: Root, nodes, leaves, height, depth, n-ary trees.

item.title: Auth Protocols
item.description: OAuth 2.0 flows, OpenID Connect (OIDC), SAML.

item.title: Binary Counting
item.description: Base-2 vs. Base-10, place value, counting to 10 in binary.

item.title: Binary Search Trees
item.description: BST properties, O(log n) lookup, balancing issues.

item.title: Computer Vision
item.description: Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs), kernels, pooling.

item.title: Control Flow
item.description: If/Else branching, switch statements, loops (for, while), jump tables.

item.title: Deadlocks
item.description: The 4 conditions for deadlock, prevention vs. avoidance.

item.title: Distributed Transactions
item.description: Two-Phase Commit (2PC), Sagas pattern.

item.title: NoSQL
item.description: Document stores (MongoDB), Key-Value (Redis), Columnar (Cassandra), Graph (Neo4j).

item.title: Ports & Sockets
item.description: Ephemeral ports, reserved ports (80, 443), listening vs. connected sockets.

item.title: The Ad Engine
item.description: Real-time bidding (RTB), latency constraints (<100ms), user targeting profiles, budget pacing (pacing algorithms).

item.title: The Bus
item.description: Address bus, Data bus, Control bus, bus width (32-bit vs 64-bit), bandwidth.

item.title: The Metrics System
item.description: Time-series databases, pull vs. push models, downsampling data, alert evaluation.

item.title: DNS
item.description: Domain names, A records, CNAME, MX, Recursive resolvers, propagation.

item.title: Functions
item.description: The Call Stack, stack frames, parameters, return values, pass-by-value vs. pass-by-reference.

item.title: Heaps
item.description: Min-heap vs. Max-heap, binary heap implementation, priority queues.

item.title: Hexadecimal
item.description: Base-16, conversion between Bin/Dec/Hex, RGB color codes, memory addresses.

item.title: Idempotency
item.description: Making retries safe, unique request IDs.

item.title: Memory Management
item.description: Virtual Memory, Paging, Page Tables, MMU (Memory Management Unit).

item.title: NLP
item.description: Tokenization, Word Embeddings (Word2Vec), Sequence models (RNNs).

item.title: Replication
item.description: Master-Slave, Master-Master, Read replicas, replication lag.

item.title: Session Management
item.description: Cookies (Secure/HttpOnly), JSON Web Tokens (JWT), Refresh tokens.

item.title: Storage: HDD
item.description: Magnetic platters, seek time, rotational latency, fragmentation.

item.title: The Blockchain
item.description: The Merkle Tree, Proof of Work/Stake, distributed consensus, the “Double Spend” problem, peer-to-peer propagation.

item.title: The Search Engine
item.description: Inverted indices, tokenization, tf-idf and BM25 ranking, fuzzy search, sharding.

item.title: Binary Arithmetic
item.description: Binary addition, carry bits, subtraction, overflow errors.

item.title: Cryptography
item.description: Hashing (SHA-256), Salting, Peppering, Symmetric (AES), Asymmetric (RSA).

item.title: Fault Tolerance
item.description: Circuit Breakers, Bulkheads, Retries with Exponential Backoff.

item.title: Graphs
item.description: Nodes (vertices), Edges, directed vs. undirected, weighted graphs, adjacency matrices vs. lists.

item.title: HTTP
item.description: Request/Response cycle, Verbs (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE), Status Codes (200, 404, 500).

item.title: Recursion
item.description: Base cases, recursive steps, visualizing the stack, tail-call optimization.

item.title: Sharding
item.description: Horizontal partitioning, shard keys, re-balancing data.

item.title: Storage: SSD
item.description: NAND flash, floating gate transistors, wear leveling, NVMe vs. SATA.

item.title: Swapping
item.description: Page faults, Thrashing, Swap space on disk.

item.title: The Auth System
item.description: Designing an Identity Provider, handling token rotation, signing keys (JWK), security perimeters.

item.title: The Global Search
item.description: The entire pipeline—Crawling (Frontier), Indexing (Barrel), Ranking (PageRank/ML), and Serving results.

item.title: Transformers
item.description: The Attention Mechanism, Self-Attention, Encoders/Decoders.

item.title: CAP Theorem
item.description: Consistency vs. Availability vs. Partition Tolerance.

item.title: Consistent Hashing
item.description: Distributed hash tables, adding/removing nodes without downtime.

item.title: File Systems
item.description: Inodes, File descriptors, Journals, NTFS vs. EXT4 vs. FAT.

item.title: I/O Mechanisms
item.description: Polling vs. Interrupts, Direct Memory Access (DMA), memory-mapped I/O.

item.title: LLMs
item.description: Training pipelines, Pre-training vs. Fine-tuning, RLHF, Context windows.

item.title: Negative Numbers
item.description: Signed magnitude, One’s Complement, Two’s Complement, the sign bit.

item.title: Paradigm: Imperative
item.description: Procedural programming, changing state, spaghetti code risks.

item.title: TLS/SSL
item.description: Symmetric vs Asymmetric encryption, Public Key Infrastructure (PKI), Certificates, The Handshake.

item.title: Tries
item.description: Prefix trees, autocomplete implementation, dictionary storage.

item.title: Web Attacks
item.description: SQL Injection, XSS (Cross-Site Scripting), CSRF, Man-in-the-Middle.

item.title: Bloom Filters
item.description: Probabilistic structures, false positives, membership testing, space efficiency.

item.title: Caching Strategies
item.description: Write-through, Write-back, Look-aside, Eviction policies (LRU).

item.title: Floating Point
item.description: IEEE 754 standard, sign/exponent/mantissa, precision issues (0.1 + 0.2 != 0.3).

item.title: Network Attacks
item.description: DDOS (Volumetric vs. Protocol), Syn floods, amplification attacks.

item.title: Paradigm: OOP
item.description: Classes, Objects, Inheritance, Encapsulation, Polymorphism.

item.title: Permissions
item.description: Users, Groups, rwx bits, Chmod/Chown, Root privileges.

item.title: RAG
item.description: Retrieval-Augmented Generation, Vector Databases, grounding AI.

item.title: The Browser
item.description: DOM tree, CSSOM, Render tree, Reflow vs. Repaint, JavaScript engine (V8).

item.title: The GPU
item.description: SIMD architecture, cores vs. threads, shaders, the graphics pipeline, CUDA cores.

item.title: Unique IDs
item.description: UUIDs, Snowflake IDs (Twitter), solving distributed ordering.

item.title: AI Ethics
item.description: Bias in training data, hallucinations, alignment.

item.title: Bitwise Operations
item.description: AND/OR/XOR masking, left/right shifts, checking flags, bit manipulation hacks.

item.title: Data Engineering
item.description: Data Warehouses (OLAP) vs. Databases (OLTP), ETL pipelines, Data Lakes.

item.title: Microservices
item.description: Monolith decomposition, Service Discovery, API Gateways.

item.title: Moore’s Law
item.description: Transistor density, Dennard scaling, thermal walls, the shift to multi-core.

item.title: Paradigm: Functional
item.description: Immutability, pure functions, higher-order functions, map/reduce/filter.

item.title: Security Best Practices
item.description: Principle of Least Privilege, Zero Trust, Secrets management.

item.title: Sorting: Simple
item.description: Bubble sort, Selection sort, Insertion sort (O(n^2)).

item.title: System Calls
item.description: The API to the kernel (open, read, write, fork, exec).

item.title: Web Communication
item.description: WebSockets, Long-polling, Server-Sent Events (SSE).

item.title: APIs
item.description: REST constraints, GraphQL (fetching graphs), gRPC (Protobufs).

item.title: Automation
item.description: Cron jobs, daemons, background services, scripting tasks.

item.title: Data Centers
item.description: Rack architecture, cooling systems, power redundancy, the physical internet.

item.title: Design Patterns
item.description: Singleton, Factory, Observer, Strategy, Decorator (The Gang of Four).

item.title: MCP
item.description: Model Context Protocol, standardized interfaces for AI systems to access external tools and data sources, enabling LLMs to interact with databases, APIs, and services.

item.title: Observability
item.description: Structured Logging, Metrics (Prometheus), Distributed Tracing (OpenTelemetry).

item.title: Sorting: Efficient
item.description: Merge Sort (Divide & Conquer), Quick Sort (Partitioning), stability.

item.title: Text Encoding
item.description: ASCII (7-bit), Extended ASCII, the need for Unicode, UTF-8 variable length encoding, Emojis.

item.title: AI Agents
item.description: Autonomous systems that perceive their environment, reason about goals, and take actions to achieve objectives. Agent architectures, tool use, planning, and multi-agent systems.

item.title: Data Formats
item.description: JSON vs. XML vs. YAML vs. CSV, serialization/deserialization.

item.title: Error Handling
item.description: Return codes vs. Exceptions, Try/Catch blocks, stack traces, defensive programming.

item.title: Image Representation
item.description: Pixels, resolution, color depth (8-bit vs 16-bit), RGB models, alpha channels, raster vs. vector.

item.title: Quantum Computing
item.description: Qubits, superposition, entanglement, quantum logic gates, potential vs. reality.

item.title: Search Algorithms
item.description: Linear search, Binary search (requires sorted data).

item.title: Serverless
item.description: Function-as-a-Service (Lambda), Cold starts, Event triggers.

item.title: Virtualization
item.description: Hypervisors (Type 1 vs. Type 2), Virtual Machines, emulation.

item.title: Containers
item.description: Docker, Namespaces (isolation), Cgroups (resource limits), Images vs. Containers.

item.title: Graph Traversal
item.description: Breadth-First Search (BFS), Depth-First Search (DFS), use cases for each.

item.title: Network Security
item.description: Firewalls, VPNs, Tunneling, Proxy vs. Reverse Proxy.

item.title: Regex
item.description: Regular expressions syntax, pattern matching, capture groups, performance pitfalls.

item.title: Sound Representation
item.description: Analog waves, sampling rate (Nyquist theorem), bit depth, PCM.

item.title: Environment Variables
item.description: .env files, secrets management, configuration separation.

item.title: Pathfinding
item.description: Dijkstra’s Algorithm, A* Search, shortest path problems.

item.title: Video Representation
item.description: Frame rates, resolution, inter-frame compression, I-frames/P-frames/B-frames.

item.title: Compression Algorithms
item.description: Run-Length Encoding (RLE), Huffman coding, LZW, Lossless vs. Lossy trade-offs (JPEG/MP3).

item.title: Dynamic Programming
item.description: Memoization, Tabulation, breaking down overlapping sub-problems (e.g., Fibonacci).

item.title: Why C & Rust are Fast
item.description: Memory layout, zero-cost abstractions, manual memory management vs. Garbage Collection.

item.title: Error Detection
item.description: Parity bits, Checksums, Cyclic Redundancy Checks (CRC), Hamming codes (error correction).
